analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#162-164) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#262-299)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#376-399)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#470-485)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#489-507)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#570-573) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#310-329):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#325-326)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#326-327)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#600-616) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#615)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#89-91) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#537) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#580-581)

VestedToken.calculateVestedTokens.vestedTokens (local variable @ /unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#865-874) shadows:
	- VestedToken.vestedTokens (function @ /unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#909-915)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#570-573)
	- /unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#572-573

MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#133-134)
VestedToken.MAX_GRANTS_PER_ADDRESS should be constant (/unique_chucks/44/0x88e51d12d75180556a5fd59770d62f8adf7fa703.sol#697-698)
